PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1998-11471998-06-180,  ND,  TB,  ,  , 
PrecisAmendments to the QUEEN'S REGULATIONS AND ORDERS FOR THE CANADIAN FORCES which revise Article 2.10 by permitting the Chief of the Defence Staff to assign, for pay purposes, a trade group to military occupations performed by non-commissioned members of the Reserve Force, revise Article 203.065 respecting the payment of premiums in lieu of leave in the Reserve Force, and repeal Articles 210.50 and 210.51, effective April 1, 1997.
Attachments
